CustomField.description: When enabled, a user with read access to a survey result record can view responses.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When Salesforce Record View Authorization is enabled, SurveyVista seamlessly integrates with Salesforce's robust authorization framework to control access to survey result records. When Salesforce Record View Authorization is enabled, users who possess read access to a survey result record gain the ability to view responses within the context of the workflow stage.
CustomField.label: Salesforce Record View Authorization
